title: Euro There 2
description:
"Welcome to our newest Place Presents we are VERY PROUD to be a part of this project in the smallest of ways. THERE skateboard's newest video EURO THERE 2 is not only a great video but it is exactly the type of content that we want to represent. Made on tour through Paris, Copenhagen, Malmo, & Berlin. This one has turned into a must-watch!"

Featuring: 
Marbie, Jessyka Bailey, Sam Bolton, Briana King, Kat Sy, Leo Bañuelos, Nadair Asghari, Chandler Burton, Jeffrey Cheung, Myley De Courcy, Shag, & Kien Caples.

Filmed by: 
Mike Iemma, Abi Teixeira, Trish McGowan, & Rey Choto.

Edited by: 
Leo Bañuelos.

Animations by: 
Jeffrey Cheung.
 
thereskateboards.com

title: HZC - Smoke Machine
description: This is a skate video from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. There are 37 skaters with tricks filmed in Rio, São Paulo, Barcelona, Lisbon and other cities. It's the second video from the Huflez Crew, a skate crew from Lagoa, Rio de Janeiro.

title: Quadra Supply - Saturnalia
description:
"Rio de Janeiro crew, QUADRA SUPPLY, has released their first full length video, SATURNALIA. Their "rolé desapegado" is a look at their most natural spots of Brazil, especially Rio de Janeiro. Featuring Sergio Santoro, Alexandre Maia, Evandro Martins, Victor Peralta,
Nicolas Poppe and John Anderson, the video was made in a couple of months, filmed and edited by João Dutra."

title: Poweredge - We Are Skateboarders
description: We Are Skateboarders is a 'as real as it gets' documentation of the soul of skateboarding, and how some of the legendary skateboarders feel its soul has changed over the years. Since the mainstream has come to play a major role in the skateboard industry, there has been much dispute amongst skateboarders if skateboarding is losing its purity and status as a core activity. The film tackles this issue with enlightening interviews from famous skateboarders such as Lance Mountain, Greg Lutzka, Rob Dyrdek, Peter Smolik, and Christian Hosoi, creating the most legitimate discussion towards the controversy in the skateboarding industry. Shot in Los Angeles, and NYC.
